title: ISic001741. I.Sicily inscription 001741
body:
Facsimile Images

1ΚΡΟΠΙΑΝΟ
2Σ

Apparatus criticus

Text from Orsi 1893

English translation

Kropianos

commentary

Orsi (1893) 303: The inscription was found at the head of the sacrophagus; it states the name of the deceased interred within.

bibliography

  • Orsi 1893 303 no. 92 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001715
  • Strazzulla 1897 150 no. 211 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001390
